titleStmt.title: An olde mans lesson, and a young mans loue. By Nicholas Breton
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by E. Allde] for Edward VVhite, and are to bee solde at his shop neere the little north-doore of S. Paules Church at the signe of the Gun,
